TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ProviderBase extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供可延伸提供者模型的基底實作。

span.span: Provides a base implementation for the extensible provider model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供者模型，是要用來封裝所有或部分的多個 ASP.NET 功能，例如成員資格、 設定檔，以及受保護的組態功能。The provider model is intended to encapsulate all or part of the functionality of multiple ASP.NET features, such as membership, profiles, and protected configuration. 它可讓開發人員建立支援類別，來提供多個封裝的功能實作。It allows the developer to create supporting classes that provide multiple implementations of the encapsulated functionality. 此外，開發人員可以撰寫使用提供者模型的新功能。In addition, developers can write new features using the provider model. 這可以是有效的方法，以支援多個實作的功能而不需要複製功能的程式碼或錄製應用程式層，如果需要變更的實作方法。This can be an effective way to support multiple implementations of a feature's functionality without duplicating the feature code or recoding the application layer if the implementation method needs to be changed. 類別很簡單，只包含一些基本的方法和屬性通用於所有提供者。The class is simple, containing only a few basic methods and properties that are common to all providers. 功能特定提供者 (例如) 會繼承並建立必要的方法，該功能的實作特定提供者必須支援的屬性。Feature-specific providers (such as ) inherit from and establish the necessary methods and properties that the implementation-specific providers for that feature must support. 實作特定提供者 (例如) 依序繼承功能特有的提供者 (在此情況下， )。Implementation-specific providers (such as ) inherit in turn from a feature-specific provider (in this case, ). 提供者模型的最重要的一點是，（例如，是否會保存資料為文字檔案或資料庫中） 的實作從應用程式程式碼抽象化。The most important aspect of the provider model is that the implementation (for example, whether data is persisted as a text file or in a database) is abstracted from the application code. 在組態檔中指定的特定功能的實作特定提供者類型。The type of the implementation-specific provider for the given feature is designated in a configuration file. 功能層級提供者接著會讀取組態檔中該類型，並做為功能程式碼的處理站。The feature-level provider then reads in the type from the configuration file and acts as a factory to the feature code. 應用程式開發人員接著可以使用的功能類別的程式碼。The application developer can then use the feature classes in the application code. 實作類型可以空出在組態檔中，而不必重寫程式碼，以配合不同的實作方法。The implementation type can be swapped out in the configuration file, eliminating the need to rewrite the code to accommodate the different implementation methodology. 隨附於 ASP.NET 提供者是大部分的功能，例如設定檔] 或 [成員資格的資料持續性實作的抽象概念。The providers included with ASP.NET are mostly abstractions of data persistence implementations for features like profiles or membership. 不過，此模型可以套用至任何其他類型的功能可能抽離，並以多種方式實作。However, this model can be applied to any other kind of feature functionality that could be abstracted and implemented in multiple ways. ## Examples 如需如何使用的範例類別，請參閱[設定檔提供者實作範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906)。For an example of how to use the class, see [Profile Provider Implementation Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906).

summary.span: 取得簡短、易讀的描述，適合顯示在管理工具或其他使用者介面 (UI) 中。

span.span: Gets a brief, friendly description suitable for display in administrative tools or other user interfaces (UIs).

value.span: 簡短、易讀的描述，適合顯示在管理工具或其他 UI 中。

span.span: A brief, friendly description suitable for display in administrative tools or other UIs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定的提供者未提供的值，描述屬性會傳回做為預設值。If a configured provider does not supply a description, the value of the property is returned as a default.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Initialize (string name, System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize(string name, class System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection config) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Initialize (name As String, config As NameValueCollection)
public: virtual void Initialize(System::String ^ name, System::Collections::Specialized::NameValueCollection ^ config);
abstract member Initialize : string * System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection -> unit override this.Initialize : string * System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection -> unit

span.span: The friendly name of the provider.

param.name: config
param.span: 名稱/值對集合，代表在此提供者設定中指定的提供者專屬屬性。

span.span: A collection of the name/value pairs representing the provider-specific attributes specified in the configuration for this provider.
Initializes the configuration builder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 基底類別實作在內部會追蹤的時間提供者的`Initialize`已呼叫方法。The base class implementation internally tracks the number of times the provider's `Initialize` method has been called. 如果提供者初始化一次以上，`InvalidOperationException`指出提供者已經過初始化就會擲回。If a provider is initialized more than once, an `InvalidOperationException` is thrown stating that the provider is already initialized. 因為大部分功能提供者呼叫之前執行的提供者特定的初始化，這個方法會避免雙重的初始設定的中央位置。Because most feature providers call prior to performing provider-specific initialization, this method is a central location for preventing double initialization. ## Examples 如需如何使用的範例，請參閱 < [ 設定檔提供者實作範例](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906)。For an example of how to use , see [Profile Provider Implementation Example](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c36e8a56-b416-40b7-95c1-c662cfb8f906).

span.span: The name of the provider is .

exception.span: 提供者名稱的長度為零。

span.span: The name of the provider has a length of zero.

exception.span: 嘗試在初始化提供者後於提供者上呼叫 。

span.span: An attempt is made to call on a provider after the provider has already been initialized.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Name As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Name { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得用來在設定期間代表提供者的易記名稱。

span.span: Gets the friendly name used to refer to the provider during configuration.

value.span: 用來在設定期間代表提供者的易記名稱。

span.span: The friendly name used to refer to the provider during configuration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建議的模式，此字串是: [*提供者建立者*] [*實作型別*] [*功能*] 提供者。The recommended pattern for this string is: [*Provider Creator*][*Implementation Type*][*Feature*]Provider. 雖然屬性也會提供好記的描述，屬性提供者時，可做為識別項。Although the property also provides a friendly description, the property is used as an identifier for the provider.
